self-indulgent.translation[0].definition: allowing yourself to have or do things that you enjoy but do not need, especially if you do this too often â€“ used to show disapproval
self-indulgent novel/film etc (=said when you think the book or film only expresses the author or director's own interests, which are not interesting to other people)
